IGardenAccessControl using Hats Protocol hat IDs **Architecture:** - Each garden can configure three hat IDs: gardener, operator, owner - Role checks query Hats Protocol instead of local mappings - Gardens can opt-in to Hats by calling `configureGarden()` - Unconfigured gardens fall through to their native access control **Hat ID Structure:** Hats uses hierarchical uint256 IDs. Gardens can use any structure, but recommended: - Top hat: Protocol-wide admin - Garden hat: Per-garden root   - Gardener hat: Child of garden hat   - Operator hat: Child of garden hat (inherits gardener)   - Owner hat: Child of garden hat (inherits operator) **Usage:** 1. Deploy HatsModule (singleton) 2. Garden admin calls `configureGarden(gardenAddress, gardenerHatId, operatorHatId, ownerHatId)` 3. Resolvers call `isGardener()` / `isOperator()` via the adapter","events":{"AdminChanged(address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when the admin account has configureGarden(address,uint256,uint256,.details: Can be called by owner, config authority, or garden owner

deconfigureGarden(address).details: Reverts garden to native access control

returns._0: True if garden has hat configuration

isGardener(address).details: Checks if account wears the gardener hat for msg.sender (the garden)

returns._0: True if account is a gardener
True if account is a gardener

isOperator(address).details: Checks if account wears the operator hat for msg.sender (the garden)

returns._0: True if account is an operator
True if account is an operator

isOwner(address).details: Checks if account wears the owner hat for msg.sender (the garden)

returns._0: True if account is an owner
True if account is an owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.authorized: True to authorize, false to deauthorize

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeTo(address).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

configAuthority(address).notice: Addresses authorized to configure gardens (e.g., GardenToken, deployer)

configureGarden(address,uint256,uint256,.notice: Configure hat IDs for a garden

deconfigureGarden(address).notice: Remove hat configuration for a garden

isConfigured(address).notice: Check if a garden is configured with Hats

isGardener(address).notice: Check if an address is a gardener of this garden

isGardenerOf(address,address).notice: Check if account is a gardener of a specific garden

isOperator(address).notice: Check if an address is an operator of this garden

isOperatorOf(address,address).notice: Check if account is an operator of a specific garden

isOwner(address).notice: Check if an address is the owner of this garden

isOwnerOf(address,address).notice: Check if account is an owner of a specific garden

setConfigAuthority(address,bool).notice: Add or remove a config authority

setHatsContract(address).notice: Update the Hats Protocol contract address
